title: Why They’re Upset
author: VD
content_html:
You can’t really blame the anti-Trump people for being shocked and dismayed about the election results. Everyone was comprehensively gaslighted in the lead-up to it.

What will be Wednesday’s Headline? (Percentage of 74,591 votes)

38.56% – Harris Wins Decisively

33.33% – Race Too Close To Call

19.02% – Harris Ekes Out Victory

5.71% – Trump Wins Decisively

3.38% – Trump Ekes Out Victory

Barely more than 10 percent of TRUMP voters expected what actually happened. Which is yet another reminder of why paying attention to the mainstream media only ensures that one will be misinformed. Keep this in mind the next time you find yourself reacting emotionally in some way to a mainstream report and remind yourself that it is at least partially false, and most likely, is substantially false.

Case in point. Consider these two reports about the war in Ukraine, both taken from recent mainstream media sources.

  • Russia lost more than 710,000 troops since the beginning of Russia’s full-scale invasion almost three years ago, the General Staff of Ukraine’s Armed Forces said this week. Despite the heavy losses, Moscow is pushing forward with its ‘meat assaults’ and continues to advance at its fastest rate since 2022, with Ukraine’s armed forces chief admitting this month that it is currently facing ‘one of the most powerful’ Russian offensives since the war broke out.
  • A new estimate by a U.S. official in October 2024, put the number of Ukrainian casualties at more than 57,500 killed.

Think about how misinformed you have to be to believe that Russia has suffered 12x Ukraine’s KIAs while simultaneously putting the Kiev regime on the brink of surrender?

DISCUSS ON SG

You can’t really blame the anti-Trump people for being shocked and dismayed about the election results. Everyone was comprehensively gaslighted in the lead-up to it.
What will be Wednesday’s Headline? (Percentage of 74,591 votes)
38.56% – Harris Wins Decisively
33.33% – Race Too Close To Call
19.02% – Harris Ekes Out Victory
5.71% – Trump Wins Decisively
3.38% – Trump Ekes Out Victory
Barely more than 10 percent of TRUMP voters expected what actually happened. Which is yet another reminder of why paying attention to the mainstream media only ensures that one will be misinformed. Keep this in mind the next time you find yourself reacting emotionally in some way to a mainstream report and remind yourself that it is at least partially false, and most likely, is substantially false.
Case in point. Consider these two reports about the war in Ukraine, both taken from recent mainstream media sources.
Russia lost more than 710,000 troops since the beginning of Russia’s full-scale invasion almost three years ago, the General Staff of Ukraine’s Armed Forces said this week. Despite the heavy losses, Moscow is pushing forward with its ‘meat assaults’ and continues to advance at its fastest rate since 2022, with Ukraine’s armed forces chief admitting this month that it is currently facing ‘one of the most powerful’ Russian offensives since the war broke out.
A new estimate by a U.S. official in October 2024, put the number of Ukrainian casualties at more than 57,500 killed.
Think about how misinformed you have to be to believe that Russia has suffered 12x Ukraine’s KIAs while simultaneously putting the Kiev regime on the brink of surrender?
